fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Follow another player. Any attempt to prevent your target's action from succeeding, or make it target someone else, will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Any attempt to force your ability to fail will instead fail itself. (This doesn't apply to the Factional Attack.)

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- 1 use Basic Defense
- You may Follow up to two players each night.
- Your anti-fail attribute will now apply when you're using the Factional Attack.
